Package database

Class Answers

java.lang.Object
database.Database
database.Answers
public class Answers extends Database
Accesses database for answers using .txt file: .\database\answers. Extends class Database.

      public static void add​(String userID, String qID, String filePath, int points)
      Parameters:
      userID - user ID of who made answer
      qID - question ID of question answered
      filePath - image file path
      points - grade given

      public static int findAnswer​(String userID, String QID)
      Parameters:
      userID - search term of user ID who made answer
      QID - search term of question ID answered
      Returns:
      index of answer with the two search terms as fields

    • update

      public static void update()
      updates all answers in databases. Clears answers which don't have users or questions.

    • numberAnswers

      public static int numberAnswers()
      Returns:
      number of entries in the database.

      public static boolean hasFeedback​(int index)
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      boolean value of whether the answer has feedback

      Parameters:
